quote: Will be going to North Dakota today to discuss tax reform and tax cuts. We are the highest taxed nation in the world - that will change.
quotePlain: Will be going to North Dakota today to discuss tax reform and tax cuts. We are the highest taxed nation in the world - that will change.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Among 35 developed nations the U.S. ranks fourth from the bottom, [according to a recent study by the OECD](http://time.com/money/4862673/us-tax-burden-vs-oecd-countries/).
checks.quotePlain: Among 35 developed nations the U.S. ranks fourth from the bottom, according to a recent study by the OECD.

claims.title: the US has highest tax rate in the world
claims.negative: the US doesn't have the highest tax rate in the world
claims.negativePlain: the US doesn’t have the highest tax rate in the world
